messages.commandNotEnabled:
The command ``{command}`` is currently not enabled!
 If you believe this is an error, please contact an administrator to get it changed!
messages.roleNotFound:
The role ``{arg}`` cannot be found. Please try again!

**Quick Tip!**
*You can use multiple inputs for entering role information.*
*You can use the ID, Mention, or name!*

**Example:**
`823925370126073876`, `@Owner`, `Owner`
messages.commandNoPermission:
You do not have permission to use the command ``{command}``
 If you believe this is an error, please contact an administrator to get it changed!
messages.channelNotFound:
The channel ``{arg}`` cannot be found. Please try again!

**Quick Tip!**
*You can use multiple inputs for entering channel information.*
*You can use the ID, Mention, or name!*

**Example:**
`823925370126073876`, `#general`, `general`
messages.userNotFound:
The user ``{arg}`` cannot be found. Please try again!

**Quick Tip!**
*You can use multiple inputs for entering user information.*
*You can use the ID, Mention, or tag!*

**Example:**
`823925370126073876`, `@i0`, `i0#0001`
messages.botNotInPluginMode: This command will only work if the bot is ran as a plugin on a Spigot Minecraft Server!
messages.notLinked: You must be linked in order to run this command. Link yourself now with `.link generate`, and follow the instructions.

ingame2faMessage: &7Two Factor Authentication required. Please use the code the bot sent you in Direct Messages. &c/2fa <code>
twoFactorAuth.2faMessage:
{authorTagBold}, Your Two Factor Authetication code is: `{code}`
Run the command `/2fa {code}` in game to verify!

event_ticketCreate.dmToTicketCreatorDescription:
You created a new ticket in the **{guildName}** discord!
 Click the channel to go to it! {ticketCreatedMention}

Please do not mention staff members, help will come as soon as one of our staff members is available! 
Thank you for your patience
event_ticketCreate.maxTicketsMessage: {authorTagBold}, you already have {max} tickets open, which is the maxiumum amount of tickets open!
event_ticketCreate.ticketCreatedEmbedFieldHeader: Please follow the question format below:
event_ticketCreate.dmToTicketCreatorTicket: {authorTag}, You have successfully created a ticket!

event_verify.dmToVerifyDesc: You have successfully verified yourself in the **{guildName}** discord!

event_inviteTracking.trackingMessageContent:
{authorTagBold} joined the server, invited by **{inviterTag}**
**Total Invites:** `{inviteCount}`

heapDumpToDiscord.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to get memory and process information. If the bot is running as a plugin, it will display basic server TPS and information too.*

userInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*The user information command retrieves simple information about the specified user!*

profile.format:
**Format:** ``{command} [user]``

*Use this command to send the profile page of the specified user, or yourself.*

runIngameCommand.logMessage: {authorTagBold} has run the command `{command}` through console!
runIngameCommand.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <command>``

*Use this command to run a command through console to ingame!*
runIngameCommand.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, you have run the command `{command}` through console!

MCServerInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Server IP>``

*You can use this command to get information about a specified server address.*

fun_8ball.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Question>``

*Use this fun command to ask the almighty magic 8ball a question! Be aware if you cannot handle the truth!*

ban.logMessage:
{mentionedUserTagBold} has been banned from the server by {authorTagBold}
With the reason: `{reason}`
ban.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [reason]``

*Use this command to ban a user from the discord server. They will need to be unbanned in order to join back! Be careful with who you give the ban hammer to!*
ban.userAlreadyBanned: `{mentionedUserTag}` is already banned from the server!
ban.messageContent:
You have banned `{mentionedUserTag}` from the server
With the reason: `{reason}`

reactionRoles.onReactionDMDescRemoved:
:x: You no longer have the ``{roleName}`` role in the **{guildName}** discord.

*To get the role back, react to the message again!*
reactionRoles.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to start the Reaction Role Creator Wizard in your direct messages. Your Creator will expire with 5 minutes of inactivity.
In Creating a reaction role panel will allow users to react to the specified emojis to obtain, and remove roles from their discord account!*
reactionRoles.onReactionDMDescAdded:
:white_check_mark: You now have the ``{roleName}`` role in the **{guildName}** discord.

*To remove this role, un-react from the message!*
reactionRoles.alreadyCreating: {authorTagBold}, you are already creating a Reaction Role Panel. Please check your direct messages to finish creating it! To cancel the creator you can message me `.cancel`
reactionRoles.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, Please check your Direct Messages to complete the Reaction Role Creator! Your Creator will expire with 5 minutes of inactivity.

ticketRemove.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*You can use this command to remove a user from viewing a ticket entirely. This command will only work within a valid ticket. You can always add someone back with the ticket add command!*
ticketRemove.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, you have removed the user ``{mentionedUserTag}`` from viewing this ticket!

inviteLeaderboard.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*You can use this command to check the leaderboard for most invited members to the discord server! This leaderboard will only display a maximum of 25 users.*

ticketTopLeaderboard.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*You can use this command to check the leaderboard for most closed tickets in the discord server! This leaderboard will only display a maximum of 25 users.*

serverIP.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*This command displays the server's IP address!*
serverIP.messageContent:
The servers IP is: ``play.serverip.com``

Connect today! Supported versions: ``1.8 - 1.16``

fun_slap.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to slap the hell out of your friend! Be careful though, they can slap you back!*
fun_slap.messageContent: {authorTagBold} slaps the living shit out of you `{mentionedUserTag}`, Hold the L

pollCreator.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to create a poll! Make sure to follow all instructions the bot sends!*
pollCreator.alreadyCreating: {authorTagBold}, you are already creating a poll, check your direct messages to finish filling it out!To cancel your current creator, message `.cancel` to me!
pollCreator.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, Please check your Direct Messages to complete the Poll Creator!

announce.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <channel> <content>``

*Use this command to make an announcement in a certain channel!*
announce.messageContent: {authorTagBold} You have successfully made an announcement in {channel}!

embedMaker.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <channel> <pattern>``

*Use this command to make a custom embed in a certain channel!
Using this link: https://robyul.chat/embed-creator*
embedMaker.messageContent: {authorTagBold} You have successfully made an custom embed in {channel}!

changelog.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <content>``

*Use this command to post a changelog in the changelog channel.*
changelog.messageContent: {authorTagBold} You have successfully posted a changelog in {channel}!

accept.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> <role> [content]``

*Use this command to accept someone's application! In order to accept someone, they need to have an application submitted!*
accept.userNoApplicationSubmitted: The user `{mentionedUserTag}` does not have an application submitted. They must have an application in order to accept them!
accept.defaultResponse: Congratulations! {authorTagBold} accepted your application. Contact them on discord in order to finish your application process.
accept.messageContent:
:white_check_mark: You have accepted ``{mentionedUserTag}``
 with the response: ``{response}``

ticketClose.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <reason>``

*Use this command to close someone's ticket. This command can only be used in a valid ticket. It will generate logs, and send them to both the ticket creator, and the ticket logs channel!*
ticketClose.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, the ticket `{channelName}` will close in 5 seconds. Ticket-Logs will be sent to the ticket creators Direct Messages, and go to the ticket logs channel!

serverInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command}`

*Use this command to display general information about the server.*`
serverInfo.messageContent:
**Server Owner:** {serverOwner}
**Server Region:** `{serverRegion}`
**Member Count:** `{memberCount}`
**Categories:** `{categoryCount}`
**TextChannels:** `{TextChannelCount}`
**VoiceChannels:** `{VoiceChannelCount}`
**Roles:** `{roleCount}`
**Server Creation Date:** `{serverCreationDate}`
**BotPrefix:** `{BotPrefix}`

**Bots:** `{BotCount}`
**Humans:** `{HumanCount}`
**Online:** `{onlineCount}`
**DND:** `{DNDCount}`
**Idle:** `{idleCount}`
**Offline:** `{offlineCount}`

**Server Invite Link:** {inviteLink}

ticketAdd.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to add a user to a ticket. This command will only work in a valid ticket. Adding a user to a ticket will allow them to view the history and all incoming messages from now on.*
ticketAdd.messageContent: {authorTagBold} you have added the user `{mentionedUserTag}` to the ticket.

fun_hey.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this fun command to have the bot say hello back to you!*
fun_hey.messageContent: Hello! :wave: {authorTagBold} How is your day going? I hope well!!

invite_resetData.logMessage: {authorTagBold} has cleared all invite data including the leaderboard!
invite_resetData.format: **Format:** ``{command}``*Use this command to clear all invite data, including the leaderboard!*
invite_resetData.messageContent: {authorTagBold} you successfully wiped all invite data!

roles.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to list all the roles that are currently on the server!*
roles.messageTitle: List of all roles on the server

rewards.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to claim your daily reward when linked!!*
rewards.messageContent: **{authorTag}**, you've claimed your daily reward! You've recieved {points} points.
rewards.messageWait: **{authorTag}**, you have to wait {timeLeft} before claiming your daily reward again!

reclaim.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to re-claim your rank rewards for every map!*
reclaim.messageContent: **{authorTag}**, you've claimed your reclaim for the ranks: `{dnames}`
reclaim.alreadyClaimed: **{authorTag}**, you have already claimed your reclaim for this map. Please wait until next one.
reclaim.noReclaim: **{authorTag}**, you do not have any avaliable reclaims!

reclaim_reset.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to reset all reclaim data.*

ticketRename.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <name>``

*Use this command to rename a ticket. This command can only be used inside of a valid ticket.*
ticketRename.messageContent: {authorTagBold} you have successfully renamed this ticket to `{newName}`!

createVerifyPanel.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to create the verify panel. In order for this to fully work, you need to set the channel properly in config!*
createVerifyPanel.messageContent: To ensure a safe and mutually beneficial experience, all users are required to verify themselves as an actual human. It is your responsibility as a client to read all the rules. Once you agree to them you will be bound by them for as long as you are on this server. When you are done reading them, select the reaction at the bottom to acknowledge and agree to these terms, which will grant you access to the rest of the server.

messageClear.logMessage: {authorTagBold} has cleared all the messages in {channel}
messageClear.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to clear all the messages in a channel. Note, if the message is over 14 days old, the bot cannot delete it due to discord limitations!*
messageClear.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, You have cleared all the messages in this channel!

roleInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <role>``

*Use this command to get information about a specified role!*

role_all.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <role>``

*Use this command to give everyone on the server that role*
role_all.noUsersToGive: {authorTagBold}, could not apply roles. Everyone already has the role `{roleName}`!
role_all.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, You have queued giving the role `{roleName}` to **{userCount}** users. This will take around `{time}` to complete.

reject.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [content]``

*Use this command to reject someone's application. They must have an application submitted if the `requireAppToBeSubmittedToReject` is true*
reject.userNoApplicationSubmitted: The user `{mentionedUserTag}` does not have an application submitted. They must have an application in order to accept them!
reject.defaultResponse: If you are still interested in applying, apply again in 2 weeks. Thank you for applying!
reject.messageContent:
:x: You have rejected ``{mentionedUserTag}``
With the response: `{response}`

reloadConfig.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to reload config after it was changed. Give the bot a few seconds to catch up after you run the command!*
reloadConfig.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, you have successfully reloaded the configuration!

invites.format:
**Format:** ``{command} [user]``

*Use this command to check yours, or other users' invites to the server. When someone leaves the server, whoever invited them will lose an invite.*
invites.messageContent: ``{authorTag}`` has **{authorInviteCount}** user invites to the server.

fun_coinFlip.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to flip a coin, heads or tails!*
fun_coinFlip.messageContent: {authorTagBold} You flipped a coin, and you got a `{flip}`. Hope it was what you we're hoping for!

ticketInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to display information about a ticket. This command can only be used in a valid ticket.*

ticketAdminOnly.alreadyAdminOnly: {authorTagBold}, this ticket is already in Admin Only mode.
ticketAdminOnly.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to turn a ticket into Admin Only mode. This means any role defined in config to be admin only will be able to see the ticket from then on.*
ticketAdminOnly.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, you have changed the ticket to admin only!

apply.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to start an application in Direct Messages. There is a 5 minute timeout for inactivity.*
Questions: What game modes do you play regularly (Factions, Prison, Skyblock) and for how long?
Have you played MCRivals? (When? How long?)
What are your overall thoughts on MCRivals?
Would you be in a position to attend some meetings in voice channels (varying times to accommodate time zones) with staff and devs to discuss new ideas for the server?
Add anything else you’d like to say here:
If the Council is full, would you like to be considered for openings in the future?
apply.submitMessage:
You have completed the application. Type `submit` to submit it to the staff team!

Thanks so much and we’ll be in touch via discord in a few days.
apply.alreadyCreating: {authorTagBold}, you are already creating an application, check your Direct Messages to continue filling it out!
apply.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, Please check your Direct Messages To complete the application.

memberCount.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to display the member count of the discord server!*

fun_dice.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to roll a die. Good luck!*
fun_dice.messageContent: {authorTagBold}, you rolled a die, and rolled a `{roll}`. Hope it was what you we're hoping for!

avatar.format:
**Format:** ``{command} [user]``

*Use this command to get yours, or another user's discord avatar!*

createTicketPanel.ticketPanelDescription: Click to one of the emojis to create a corresponding ticket!

ticketOptions.PanelDescription: General questions, concerns or any support you need.
Tickets that admins and above can see.

createTicketPanel.format:

unban.messageContent: You have unbanned `{mentionedUserTag}` from the discord server!

With the reason: `{reason}`
